title-group.article-title:
Care recommendations for parturient and postpartum women and newborns during the COVID-19 pandemic: a scoping review
*

trans-title-group.trans-title: Recomendaciones asistenciales a la mujer en el parto y postparto y al recién nacido durante la pandemia de COVID-19: revisión sistemática exploratoria
Recomendações assistenciais à parturiente, puérpera e recém-nascido durante a pandemia de COVID-19: revisão de escopo
